about_the_game: The Henry Mosse and the Wormhole Conspiracy Official Soundtrack features original music from Melbourne-based Felix Watson, Nicholas Roder and Finn Bennet. With the Budapest Scoring Orchestra performing on two of the tracks, the score will be sure to take you away to another world of musical delight!

With the Budapest Scoring Orchestra performing on two of the tracks, the score will be sure to take you away to another world of musical delight!
